CustomField.description: Owned by Sales (Hy Mixson/Dean Bikle) and PM (Casey Crawford). Required as part of the MBO to track RTS to RNA Product Migrations.
CustomField.formula: IF(Active_Alert__c = TRUE, "AA ", "")&""& IF(Fleet_Loader__c = TRUE, "FL ", "")&""& IF(Mobilecast__c = TRUE, "MC ", "")&""& IF(Roadnet__c = TRUE, "RN ", "")&""& IF(Roadnet_Performance_Dashboard__c = TRUE, "RPD ", "")&""& IF(Scheduler__c = TRUE, "NS ", "")&""& IF(Mobilecast_Phone__c = TRUE, "PH ", "")&""& IF(Territory_Planner__c = TRUE , "TP ", "")&""& IF(X3rd_Party_Mobile__c = TRUE , "3PM ", "")&""& IF(XRS_Standalone_XRS_S__c = TRUE , "XRS-S ", "")&""& IF(XRS_XRS__c = TRUE , "XRS ", "")&""& IF(Telematics_Adapter_TA__c = TRUE , "TA ", "")&""& IF(Bridge_Dispatch__c = TRUE , "BD ", "")&""& IF(Bridge_Insight__c = TRUE , "BI ", "")&""& IF(Bridge_Telematics__c = TRUE , "BT ", "")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formulaic display used for reporting, based on which products the customer is using.
CustomField.label: RN Product Concatenation
